segments.text: I can't believe how calm the woman is while the sink is overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just polishing that plate like nothing else matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy on the stool, and it makes me nervous; he could fall any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is so focused on getting a cookie, she doesn't even notice the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the water on the floor is going to cause a big mess if it's not cleaned up soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit funny how the children are sneaking cookies right behind the woman's back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will get angry when she finally notices the overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip over, and that really worries me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the garden outside looks so peaceful compared to the chaos in here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is being a bit too adventurous with that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around and sees the children before something bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR
